posts.content:
Sunday 28th June 2015
Full details on www.beaulieu.co.uk

The first ever Simply VW rally at Beaulieu will be held on Sunday 28 June.

VW owners are invited to bring their car to Beaulieu and park within the museum complex for what promises to be an unforgettable day.

Whether you are an owner or an enthusiast there will be something for everyone; from modern marvels such as the Golf GTI and Scirocco to classics such as the Campervan or the Original Beetle, all models are welcome. It is an oppurtunity to admire some superb examples of these cult vehicles and to connect with fellow enthusiasts at an iconic location.

All owners taking part will be entered into the People’s Choice Award, with the winner receiving a Beaulieu trophy. The winner will be selected by a public vote. To enter the car you think should win, simply fill out a form which will be available from Visitor Reception or on arrival in a VW on the day.


There will be a cavalcade of the best cars from the show culminating in a prize giving for the People's Choice Award.


simply VWVehicle Entry

Entry into the Beaulieu Parkland with your VW is from 9.30am – the Brabazon Restaurant will be open for bacon rolls, cakes, teas and coffee.

Please note that if you wish to park alongside your friends, or fellow club members, you must arrive together as there will be no designated areas available.

As well as being an opportunity to view hundreds of VW's, there is also the opportunity to visit all that Beaulieu has to offer as entry includes all aspects of the attraction; Palace House, the Abbey, the grounds and of course the world renowned National Motor Museum.




simply VWTicket Prices - 2015

Tickets can be purchased in advance online or on arrival.

Adults- £10.00

Children- £5.00

Only valid if arriving in a VW, all other visitors please come through Visitor Reception and the standard admission fee applies, find out more.

For updates on the rally please like our facebook page and sign up to our mailing list and select the 'Beaulieu' newsletter.
As I mentioned on another post, I'm going. It would be great to know if anyone else from the club is going to be there.
Hi. We are planning to go as well so will be great to see anyone else there. Phil
Hi, I'm planning on going.fingers crossed for the weather!
